changes: Feature: Implemented backflip and frontflip animations with keyboard ('Z', 'F') and mobile gesture controls (Swipe Up for Frontflip, Swipe Right for Backflip).
Feature: Added a Houdini-style animation with keyboard ('I') and mobile gesture controls (3-Finger Tap).
Feature: Integrated jumping motion into all special move animations for obstacle clearance.
Feature: Added win/loss sound effects (fx/winner.mp3 and fx/quack.mp3 as placeholder for loser sound).
Bugfix: Resolved animation defect where rotational animations only affected limbs, not the entire body.
Improvement: Remapped mobile gestures to accommodate new animations (Power Stomp to Swipe Down, Dive to 2-Finger Tap).
Improvement: Updated in-game info panel to reflect new keyboard and mobile controls.
Improvement: Adjusted 'City Roadway' theme: Lighter sky color for a distinct horizon, added a black curb line above road lines, and adjusted yellow road lines for better visual spacing.
Improvement: Repositioned 'Power-up >>' animation to display at the bottom inside the gameCanvas.
Feature: Added a clickable info icon to the Heist Control Panel that displays key and mobile gesture assignments for gameplay, with separate sections for keyboard and mobile controls.
Feature: Added hurdler animations for all characters, triggered by the 'j' key or a two-finger tap.
Feature: Added a Special Move for each character, triggered by the 'k' key or a three-finger tap.
Feature: Implemented four new visual themes: Brown Mountains, White Snowpeaks, Orange and Black Volcano, and City Roadway.
Enhancement: Refined the City Roadway theme's yellow stripes for better visual scale and placement.
Enhancement: Updated the Volcano theme with white hurdles and a royal blue sky for improved aesthetics.
Enhancement: Reworked the accelerator power-up animation to a more dynamic three-step stutter boost.
Enhancement: Added a yellow lava-like effect to the volcano theme's grass blades.
Enhancement: Updated milestone hurdle colors to white for Green Grass and Black and Orange Volcano themes for better contrast.
Bugfix: Fixed a regression where the 'Load Custom Data' button was not loading user-provided data.
Bugfix: Corrected the audio muting logic to ensure background music resumes correctly when unmuted during gameplay.
Bugfix: Corrected collision detection logic for all on-screen objects on slanted ground to ensure accuracy.
Enhancement: Adjusted the turbo boost animation to a 15-degree upward angle for a more dynamic 'blast-off' effect.
Enhancement: Added a 'power-up' sound effect for accelerator collisions to improve audio feedback.
